raw_body:
DE LIMA,​ SHEILA (née Diaz) “Safe in the arms of Jesus”,​ passed away peacefully in her sleep on 10th April 2024. Beloved wife of the late Fred,​ devoted mother of Jeremy,​ mother-in-law of Rebecca,​ grandmother of Shannon and Tanya,​ Chasnyn and Robert and Maxine,​ great-grandmother of Micah,​ Violet,​ Luca,​ Ivy and baby Olive,​ sister of the late Doreen,​ Aubrey and Trevor,​ much loved sister-in-law and aunt,​ and friend to many. The remains will lie at A.F Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on Friday 19th April from 12 noon onwards,​ followed by burial at 3:30 p.m. at The General Cemetery,​ Borella (Roman Catholic Section).
025389
